issue.title: Similar to how we have free models of OpenCode Zen add automatically supported free models of https://github.com/Kilo-Org/kilo
issue.body:
Focus on GLM-5, but if other free models are available add support for them in code, and explanation in docs.

Please collect data related about the issue to this repository, make sure we compile that data to `./docs/case-studies/issue-{id}` folder, and use it to do deep case study analysis (also make sure to search online for additional facts and data), and propose possible solutions  (including known existing components/libraries, that solve similar problem or can help in solutions).

free_models.name: GLM 4.7
free_models.description: Latest variant of the GLM family, purpose-built for agent-centric applications

free_models.name: Kimi K2.5
free_models.description: Optimized for agentic capabilities including tool use and code synthesis

free_models.name: MiniMax M2.1
free_models.description: A capable model from MiniMax with strong general-purpose performance

free_models.name: Giga Potato
free_models.description: A stealth release model currently free during evaluation

free_models.name: Trinity Large Preview
free_models.description: A preview model with strong capabilities
